body.bibl: Murre-van den Berg, Hendrika Lena. “A Neo-Aramaic Gospel Lectionary Translation by Israel of Alqosh (Ms. Syr 147, Houghton Library, Harvard University, 1769/70).” In Loquentes Linguis: Studi Linguistici e Orientali in Onore Di Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti = Linguistic and Oriental Studies in Honour of Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti = Lingvistikaj Kaj Orientaj Studoj Honore al Fabrizio A. Pennacchietti, edited by Pier Giorgio Borbone, Alessandro Mengozzi, and Mauro Tosco, 523–33. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2006.

Hendrika Lena Murre-van den Berg, A Neo-Aramaic Gospel Lectionary Translation by Israel of Alqosh (Ms. Syr 147, Houghton Library, Harvard University, 1769/70), in Loquentes Linguis: Studi Linguistici e Orientali in Onore Di Fabrizio A.
